page.title: 02Farming In The Steyning Area
page.content: Our area is a mixed farming area because some of it is brookland which is useless to farmers because it is so wet,some of the land is very chalky. The land is graded,the best in our area is grade 2.One of the most common crops is oil seed rape which is used to make margarine.Other common crops are wheat,barley and oats.The main farms in our area are{Kingsbarn Farm which is very near a river so it is mainly brookland.It is a beef farm. {Huddlestone Farm}which has 120 dairy cows and a few fields of crops. {Wyckham Dale Farm}which is a dairy farm.{Nash Farm}which is not really a farm but a hotel with a vineyard and {Wappingthorn Farm}which is mainly dairy cows with a few crops.There is also a{Poultry Farm}and the{Wiston {Estates}on which are mixed farming areas.
